titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3746) to provide for a responsible increase to the debt ceiling.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3746) to provide for a responsible increase to the debt ceiling.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-81, by Mr. Cole.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3746 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 21.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 456.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 187 (Roll no. 241).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3746 (Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023, which increases the federal debt limit, establishes new discretionary spending limits, rescinds unobligated funds, and expands work requirements for federal programs).
